text: The men stand over the women through that with which God has preferred some of them over others and that which they expend of their wealth.He gave the men more than the women because the burden is all on them, for theirs is the perfec- tion of strength and the eminence of aspiration. They carry burdens in the measure of strength or in the measure of aspiration. �Resolutions are made in the measure of the folk of resoluteness.�
